title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8128.68 - Town of North Hempstead
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8128.68 - Town of North Hempstead

State Regulations
(a) Glen Cove

Road, a county road, between interchange 39 of IR 495 (SH 57-2) and Old Country

Road, a distance of 2.8 miles, is designated as an access highway for special
dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route shall only be used
between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (b) Shelter Rock Road. Shelter Rock Road
between interchange 35 of I-495 and the Lord and Taylor facility in the Town of

North Hempstead and the Village of North Hills. (e) Route 25 between Glen Cove Road and

Nassau Boulevard. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8128.68

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
